title: Preseason
body: Does anyone know when preseason begins and how the procedure work. (How you get your rank, how many games do you have to win to maintain your current rank Ä—.t.c)

replies.body:
it is preseason. You don't need to play at all during preseason since rank decay is turned of during preseason.

Everyone becomes unranked (and have a small MMR reset) when season 5 starts which will be the when patch 5.1 is released. At which point you must play 10 placement matches in order to obtain a rank like every seaosn.
